  • Articles
    • Working with SQL data bases

mlr3db

Extends the mlr3 package with a data backend to transparently work with data bases. Internally relies on the abstraction of packages dplyr and dbplyr.

See mlr3db.mlr-org.com for short introduction.

Links

  • Browse source code at
    https://​github.com/​mlr-org/​mlr3db
  • Report a bug at
    https://​github.com/​mlr-org/​mlr3db/​issues
